D

dict - Static variable in class WordRecord
 
displayMessage(boolean) - Method in class WordPanel
This is a synchronized method that will display a message to the user that shows if the user has won or lost the game as well as the users score for that iteration of the game This message will only be displayed if the messageCount instance variable is equal to zero.
done - Static variable in class WordPanel
 
drop(int) - Method in class WordRecord
This is a synchronized method that allows for the animation of the word dropping.
dropped() - Method in class WordRecord
Synchronized accessor method that returns if the word has dropped or not
